skills.name: RETURN
desc: • Deal random damage to a single target.
• 25% Chance to gain an Extra Turn.
• 35% Chance to Heal up to 3 allies for 15% of their MAX HP.

skills.name: PERIL
desc: • Increase ATK of ally for 3 turns.
• Increase MAGIC of ally for 3 turns.
• Doom deals deadly damage to targets after 4 turns.
